property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, reveal a card from your hand chosen by your opponent at random. If that card is a non-evolution creature, you may return one of your creatures from the battle zone to your hand. If you do, put the revealed creature into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPACE CHARGE}: Water (Whenever you put a Water card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Look at one of your opponent's shields. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has "blocker" from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your shields face down. ■ At the start of your next turn, return 2 of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of those shields.

card.name: Gallows Devil Dragon, Dead Sea Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent can't cast spells or summon creatures for no cost. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owner's hand. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

property.name: Rules

alternate.name: Gaial King Dragon, Raging Dragon Lord

property.name: Rules

card.name: Gaial King Dragon, Raging Dragon Lord

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses 2 cards in their hand and reveals them. You choose one of these and your opponent discards it from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your water and fire creatures in the battle zone has "slayer". (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent chooses one of their untapped creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a Fire or Nature psychic creature that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPACE CHARGE}: Water (Whenever you put a Water card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Discard all cards in your hand, then draw 5 cards. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may draw a card. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

alternate.name: Gallows Devil Dragon, Dead Sea Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent can't cast spells or summon creatures for no cost. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owner's hand. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a Fire or Nature psychic creature that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPACE CHARGE}: Darkness (Whenever you put a Darkness card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If your opponent has a creature that has "blocker" in the battle zone, this creature costs 3 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your darkness and nature creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +3000". (While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +3000" gets +3000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPACE CHARGE}: Nature (Whenever you put a Nature card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) This turn, this creature gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPACE CHARGE}: Light (Whenever you put a Light card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put a light, fire or nature psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a creature from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a creature from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {POWER ATTACKER} +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPACE CHARGE}: Fire (Whenever you put a Fire card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 1000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If that card is a light or fire card, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player shuffles all cards in their hand and graveyard into their deck. Then each player draws 5 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Beast Folk. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Hunter creatures in the battle zone.
